name: Janapada Kala Darshana
description: "Janapada Kala Darshana" is a vibrant and cultural event that celebrates the essence of rural life, traditions and cuisine of Karnataka. Explore the rich heritage and history of the region with a guided museum tour at Jana Pada loka, showcasing artifacts and exhibits that highlight the cultural significance of the area.Enjoy sumptuous traditional meals at Kamat Lokaruchi, featuring an array of authentic local dishes that are served in a picturesque traditional village setup, offering a taste of rural life.Visit to chennapatna toy workshop run by Shilpa Trust, where artisans craft exquisite traditional toys, offering insights into the age-old art of toy making. Immerse yourself in the cultural heritage of the region with captivating performances like Dollu Kunitha, a dynamic and rhythmic drum dance."Janapada Kala Darshana" promises a delightful blend of cultural immersion, culinary delights, and interactive experiences that showcase the beauty of rural life and traditions.Special Offer: Enjoy a delightful 20% discount by using the coupon code "GVM20" at checkout. Valid until midnight tonight.

location.address: Doddamannugudde Forest, Karnataka 562159, India

organizer.name: JANAPADA KALA DARSHANA
organizer.description: "Janapada Kala Darshana" is a vibrant and cultural event that celebrates the essence of rural life, traditions and cuisine of Karnataka.

name: Popular Tea Cakes Workshop
description: Popular Tea Cakes Workshops We cover a variety of  of 5 various tea cakes that we teach from scratch. We use only the best of ingredients and source everything locally. We teach you how to bake cakes and the frostings that go with it, in a tradiotional method. Its a hands on experince and we provide the students with hand outs which they will be taking home with them.-Banana Cake with Dark Chocolate Chips-Sticky Toffee Date Cake with Salted Caramel Sauce -Carrot Cake with Cream Cheese Frosting -Orange Pound Cake Looking forward to baking the world a better place!

name: Friday Workday Deli Counter
description: Friday Deli CounterWant to spend a day in the heart of Indiranagar, on a work-day,  getting loads done and enjoying the beautiful tree-top view? Come spend a working day with us at the co-working space at Studio by Copper + Cloves. Our members find that they are more productive than usual at the Studio! This Friday we are opening out the space beyond our members, for an open-day with a delicious, nourishing 'fill-your-plate' spread !Nourish yourself at our ‘all you can eat’ deli counter and work from our beautiful cafe/co-working space at the Studio that is normally a members-only space!

organizer.name: Copper + Cloves
organizer.description: We are all about nourishing food and creating spaces for connection!

name: Breathing for Balance: An Autumn Equinox Journey
description: Join us for a transformative breathwork session as we celebrate the Autumn Equinox, a day where light and dark are perfectly balanced. This powerful event will focus on achieving balance in our lives—between the left and right sides of the body, the masculine and feminine energies, and the head and heart.Key Themes:Balance between Left and Right: Harmonizing the two sides of our physical and energetic being.Balance between Masculine and Feminine: Uniting opposing energies within us.Balance between Head and Heart: Aligning thoughts with feelings for greater clarity and peace.This session welcomes everyone—whether you're attending as a couple, with a friend or family member, or individually—focusing on fostering balance within and between ourselves.Conscious Connected Breathwork allows us to explore the powerful connection between our breath and our true essence. As Ram reminds us through the words in the image: “We are all already perfect at our core. There is nothing that needs to be fixed or changed" we’ll reconnect with the perfection that already exists within each of us.What to expect from the workshop -Practice techniques that bring awareness to how we disconnect from our core selves.Use mindful breathing to release traumas, memories, and subtle energies that hold us back.Journalling prompts to explore your masculine and feminine energies that lie within you

name: Warrior Rhythm with Usha + Brunch at the Studio
description: Join us for a 70-minute Warrior Rhythm™ session with Usha Rao—an energizing blend of yoga flows, strength training, and HIIT, all set to a fun and rhythmic pace. It’s a fitness class with a mindful twist, helping you build strength, flexibility, and balance while keeping the energy high.After the class, we’ll gather for a delicious brunch featuring a sumac and ginger infusion , nourishing salads, and energy balls .Come for the workout, stay for the brunch, and find your community. Leave feeling nourished—inside and out.

name: Cheesecake Workshop
description: This class is for all the cheescake lovers. Here at Flourish, we teach you a variety of cheesecakes that range with technique and flavour. Tips, tricks and methods pertaining to perfecting your cheesecake is covered in this class. A variety of 3 cheesecakes is taught.-Baked New York Cheesecake -Frozen Fruit Cheesecake -Cotton Cheesecake (Japanese Cheesecake) All information regarding the baking of these widely different cheesecake will be passed on to our students. We provide you with all the ingredients, tools and know-how for the class including a handout which you will be taking home. Along with that, you will be taking the lovely cheesecakes you've made at the class, back home to your friends and family. Join us for a fun filled, cheese-centric workshop! Cheers!

name: Brownie Workshop
description: Join us in  baking two versions of a delectable Brownie. Everything we teach you is made from scartch. Tips, tricks and techniques required to perfecting your brownie is thoroughly taught at this class. Various ways to spice up your brownie with toppings and what combination works best! You will learn-An Eggless Brownie A Brownie with Egg Both versions of the brownie is fanatstic and you can't chose which one you like more!All ingredients are provided to you including the tools! We provide you with handouts as well which you will be taking home with you along with the brownies youve made yourself! Looking forward to a delectable class filled with chocolate and fun!

name: Shamanic sound healing with Lifang Huang
description: Shamanic sound healing is a practice rooted in ancient spiritual traditions, where sound is used as a powerful tool for healing and transformation.  Join Taiwanese Shamanic Sound healer Lifang Huang (@lifang_sound_healer_ ) for an evening of deep sound vibrations. Lifang Creates a healing sound bath using Tibetan singing bowls Nepalese shamanic drums her voice and other instruments.We will also include a cacao ceremony which will help in your nervous system regulation. During a session, the participant typically lies down in a relaxed state while the practitioner plays the instruments in a rhythmic and intentional manner. The sounds are often rhythmic and repetitive, inducing a meditative or trance-like state that allows the participant to journey inward. This altered state of consciousness is where healing is said to occur, as the sounds help to align the mind, body, and spirit.

location.name: Copper + Cloves

name: ARAKU Open House: Coffee Around The World
description: Instant isn’t in our vocabulary; with ARAKU Coffee, slow is the way to go! In celebration of International Coffee Day, Introducing ARAKU Open House: an open-for-all invitation to explore the world of specialty coffee. This program, under ARAKU World Specialty Coffee Academy (AWSCA), aims to foster a more inclusive and accessible coffee community, one cup at a time.What to Expect:Taste Global Coffees: Taste international coffees and sample a selection of ARAKU’s finest SKUs, guided by our coffee mentor and expert, Sherri Johns. As a renowned barista trainer, Head Judge of the Gems of Araku Competition, and Authorised SCA Trainer (AST), Sherri brings a wealth of knowledge and passion to each session.Connect and Share: Immerse yourself in a vibrant community of coffee enthusiasts. Swap stories, rituals, and traditions with fellow coffee lovers from around the world, and explore how local cafes and global cultures intertwine through coffee.Who Should Attend: Coffee aficionados eager to deepen their knowledge of global coffee culture. Those curious about different coffee varieties and brewing techniques. Anyone looking to connect with a lively community of coffee enthusiasts and professionals.Spaces are limited to just 15 participants, so be sure to secure your spot at the earliest.October 1st, Tuesday | 4:30 PM OnwardsAWSCA, 1st floor, Araku Coffee, Indiranagar, Bangalore.

location.address: 968, 12th Main Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008, India

name: Wednesday Supper Club | Dine in Brazilian style
description: Step into the vibrant streets of Rio with our Wednesday Supper Club!This week, we’re heading to Boteco, a beloved spot among expats, for an evening that’s all about Brazilian flavor and Carnival flair! 🇧🇷🎉At Boteco, you'll enjoy a warm, inviting atmosphere that reflects the lively spirit of Rio. Known for its authentic Brazilian cuisine and vibrant energy, it's the perfect setting for a night where strangers become friends. 🍽️🎶Expect a night filled with:Flavor-packed Brazilian dishes that’ll make your taste buds dance the Samba. 🌮Bossa Nova rhythms that’ll have you swaying with the beat. 🎵A Carnival-inspired ambiance that’s as festive as it is fun. 🎊This evening is not just about exploring new flavors—it's also your chance to meet new people and share great conversations. Dive into mouthwatering Brazilian dishes while you mingle with fellow guests and make new friends, Boteco's lively atmosphere is the perfect place to mix, mingle, and make real connections. 🥂🤝📅 Wednesday📍 BotecoJoin us for a night where the spirit of Rio, fantastic food, and new friendships come together. Vamos fazer amigos—this is one supper club you don’t want to miss!

name: Sunday Breakfast with Strangers
description: Ready to kickstart your day with a delightful twist? 🌞 Join us for a Breakfast with Strangers Table at Maverick & Farmer, where exceptional breakfast meets great company!Maverick & Farmer is known for its cozy, charming ambiance and its diverse egg options that cater to every taste. From classic Eggs Benedict 🍳 to indulgent fluffy omelettes, you’ll be treated to a breakfast feast that’s as delightful as it is satisfying. And don’t miss their exceptional coffee ☕—perfect for energizing your morning and setting the tone for a fantastic day ahead.At our Breakfast Table, we believe in the magic of meeting new faces over a delicious meal. This is your chance to step out of your comfort zone, spark engaging conversations, and perhaps make some new friends along the way. 🤝Whether you’re new to the city, looking to expand your social circle, or just enjoy making new connections, this breakfast is for you. We’ll provide the mouthwatering food, the inviting atmosphere, and plenty of conversation starters.Just bring yourself and an open mind! 🌟Can’t wait to see you at Maverick & Farmer for a morning of great food and even better company! 🎉🍽️

name: In The House with Bandra Born, a Bar Takeover
description: For one night only, MURO will be transformed into a lively Bandra-inspired cocktail haven, with an exclusive cultural exchange that goes beyond a typical bar takeover. We’re bringing the energy, creativity, and flair of Bandra’s cocktail culture right to your glass.Raviraj Shetty, the bar Manager, Bandra Born known for his innovative approach and captures the essence of Bandra’s eclectic and dynamic spirit, showcasing fresh, seasonal ingredients with a local twist. Join us on the mezzanine deck for #InTheHouse, where the conversation between Mumbai and Bangalore flows as smoothly as the drinks. Expect a delightful mix of bold, refreshing cocktails with complex, layered flavors that highlight the best of Bandra’s cocktail craftsmanship.This is your chance to experience a night where creativity, tradition, and flavor come together in perfect harmony.

name: Bombay Style Breakfast with Strangers
description: Welcome to our Bombay Breakfast Table, where the day begins with delicious food and delightful conversation! Nestled in the heart of Bangalore, our gathering offers a warm and inviting atmosphere to kick-start your morning on a high note.As you step into our cozy venue, take a seat and indulge in a hearty breakfast spread. In essence, a Bombay-style breakfast is a delightful amalgamation of flavors and culinary traditions, offering something for every palate, from savory to sweet, light to hearty.But our Bombay Breakfast Table is about more than just the food – it's about fostering connections and building community. Strike up a conversation with fellow attendees as you sip on your favorite morning brew, sharing stories, ideas, and laughter in the company of like-minded individuals.

name: Friday Adda - Drinks & Conversations with Strangers
description: Kick off a fun Friday night with drinks in hand and dive into exciting conversations with total strangers! Share laughs, swap wild stories, and maybe even a few secrets. Who knows? You might just meet your new best friend or future partner-in-crime! The vibe is all about having fun, making unforgettable connections, and soaking in the weekend energy. With good drinks and great company, this is one night you won’t forget!

name: Art of Wooden Imprints
description: ​Block printing, a cherished craft with ancient roots, traces its origins back to India over a thousand years ago. This traditional technique involves carving intricate designs into wooden blocks, which are then dipped in dye and stamped onto fabric or paper. We work with wooden blocks, made from the finest teak wood, that are carved to perfection and handcrafted by our block makers with a lot of care and love. And yes, they last a lifetime.​What can you expect?🇮🇳 Delve into the rich heritage and ancient origins of block printing🎨 Engage in an interactive demonstration to master the art of block printing💌 Create your own beautifully designed bookmark and envelope🌸 Craft and personalise a unique tote bag, yours to take home🌯 A welcome drink and a selection of house-special appetisersConnect with like-minded creatives and forge new friendships as you immerse yourself in this unique experience!Which dyes will we use?We will be using GOTS certified organic dyes that are environment friendly. There will be a variety of colours to explore.​Who's the expert?Our instructor has a decade of experience in the fine art world. She graduated from a renowned school dedicated to Fine Arts in Bangalore, and moved on to teaching art in various international schools. A connoisseur of fine art, she has had several art shows and has sold her paintings at galleries like The Sublime Art Gallery. She explored the traditional art form of block printing first-hand in Rajasthan, and has since conducted several workshops for small and large clients across India.

organizer.name: Jamberry Experiences
organizer.description: Our experiences are designed to open up exciting, unique and berry-fresh ways of jamming out with like-minded people. From lively cookalongs and gourmet tastings to immersive creative activities and wellness pursuits, Jamberry Experiences offers something special for everyone.

name: Bungee and Bites
description: Join us for a gravity-defying bungee fitness workout like never before! It will have you flying high, toning muscles, and enjoying a low-impact, high-energy workout like no other. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or just looking to try something new, this fun and dynamic session is designed to elevate your fitness routine as you bounce, fly, and challenge your body in a whole new way.​After the workout, unwind and recharge with healthy bites, all while mingling with fellow participants. This is the perfect opportunity to make new connections in a relaxed, friendly atmosphere.​What can you expect?✨ Fun ice-breakers and an engaging playful warm-up🤸🏻‍♀️ 75 mins beginner friendly bungee workout (~800 calorie burn)🍵 Rejuvenating cup of herbal tea🥗 Protein packed salad to refuel the body🤝🏻 Interactive reflections with the group​Come for the fitness, stay for the fun, and leave with new friends and a refreshed spirit!What's Bungee Fitness?Bungee fitness is a dynamic and fun form of exercise that combines elements of traditional fitness with the added challenge and excitement of being harnessed to bungee cords. The bungee cords are attached to the ceiling, allowing participants to perform a variety of movements such as jumps, lunges, squats, and even aerial manoeuvres with reduced impact on the joints. Are you eligible?If you are above 10 years of ageIf you are not pregnant If you don't have any physical injury or medical ailmentIf you weigh less than 100 kgsWho's the instructor?He has been trained at The Tribe, Goa and has more than 3 years of bungee training experience. He's also a highly qualified dance and fitness instructor who has appeared on several TV shows.

name: Murder Mystery 🔍 🕵️‍♂️🗝️

name: Film Screening: Umrao Jaan
description: “Kitne toofan uthaye aankhon ne, naav yaadon ki doobti hi nahi … tujhse milne ki, tujhko paane ki koi tatbir soojti hi nahi”This weekend, step back in time and join us for a screening of the iconic film, Umrao Jaan with unique insights from our researcher, Saumya Mani Tripathi.This masterpiece, directed by Muzzafar Ali, tells the poignant tale of Amiran, a girl from Faizabad who is kidnapped and forced to become a tawaif in Lucknow. Experience the elegance of Rekha’s performance as she navigates the complexities of love, societal expectations, and her profession. Immerse yourself in the rich music and stunning visuals and poetic dialogues that have made Umrao Jaan a classic of Indian cinema. Witness the magic of Umrao Jaan on the big screen this weekend at MAP. This event is part of programming for our latest exhibition Tawaif: Tracing the Courtesan in the History of Cinema.

location.address: 22, Kasturba Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

organizer.name: Museum of Art and Photography (MAP Bengaluru)
organizer.description: MAP’s mission is to harness the transformative potential of art, to enrich lives, ignite creativity, and connect people.  We make art accessible and engaging for everyone through innovative experiences, meaningful dialogue and building communities.

name: Movie Mania: Bollywood Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of classic Bollywood films such as Pakeezah, Utsav, Mughal-e-Azam, and Mere Mehboob and compete against friends and fellow Bollywood enthusiasts. The quiz is inspired by our latest exhibition Tawaif: Tracing the History of Courtesans in Hindi CinemaFrom court dancer to feminist icon, the tawaif’s journey in Bollywood is multifaceted. This exhibition explores her transformation, from a figure steeped in devotion to kings and deities to a complex character who defies societal conventions. The quiz will cover themes such as the tawaif character in Hindi cinema, musical traditions deeply intertwined with the artistic legacy of the courtesans, facts on film ephemera, etc.In collaboration with 4 Edge Quizzing we promise you an evening of fascinating history, Bollywood and a chance to win exciting prices!Please note:– Groups of up to 6 can register together – Individuals are also welcome and can team up once they arrive

name: Harmony in Motion: Unlock your inner balance with Tai Chi, Qigong & Breathwork
description: Discover the art of flowing with ease and balance. 🌿✨ Join us for Harmony in Motion, a rejuvenating Tai Chi, Qi Gong, and Breathwork workshop led by a master teacher with over 40 years of experience. Reconnect with your inner self and find peace through mindful movement.In this serene session, you’ll:✨ Move gracefully with Tai Chi’s gentle sequences✨ Explore Qi Gong’s powerful energy-balancing techniques✨ Breathe deeply and relax with guided breathwork practicesWhether you're a beginner or experienced, this workshop invites you to harmonize your mind, body, and energy. Experience the calming power of ancient practices taught by a true expert in a peaceful, supportive environment.📅 Date: September 21, 2024📍 Location: The Dialogues Cafe, Koramangala🎟️ Reserve your spot today!

name: Mangalore Express with chef Velton Saldanha
description: About the pop-upMangalore holds a special place in Chef Velton’s heart—it’s where he’s from and where many of his childhood summers were spent. The food of Mangalore has always been central to his memories, deeply influencing the chef he is today.Every visit to the city has been a flavorful journey, and Chef Velton’s passion for these distinct tastes has shaped his culinary identity. Now, he’s extending a special invitation to experience the soul of Mangalore through its food—showcasing textures, flavors, and elements that are often overlooked but deserve recognition.During a recent trip to Bangalore, Chef Velton reconnected with Akhila, another proud Mangalorean who shares his love for this rich cuisine. Their conversation sparked an exciting idea: to bring the essence of Mangalore to The Conservatory for one evening, celebrating the region’s bangin’ dishes with all of you.This menu is a love letter to Mangalorean cuisine, featuring everything from the classic Baffat and Kadle Bajil to the texture-forward Biscuit Roti and the flavor-packed Sukkha, not to mention the crowd-favorite ghee roast.Join us at The Conservatory as we host Chef Velton’s Mangalorean pop-up, where every dish tells a story and every bite brings you closer to the heart of Mangalore.à la carte menuVegetarian Udupi “SAMBHAR” Chaat - Rs. 300/- Mangaluru sweet spicy sambhar served with goat cheese and puli chutney. Kale and Bhel - Rs.300/- Kale salad inspired by the street style Mangaluru churumuri bhel Totally bananas - Rs.370/-Fluffy, sweet Mangalore banana buns served with a coconut chutney Goli Baje gone wild - Rs.300/- Chilli Cheese Goli baje with green chutneyAdd on Fresh truffle (Rs.200/-)Non- VegetarianCrackling Kori 65- Rs. 350/-"Crispy, fiery, and full of crunch – Crackling is the ultimate snack attack!"Chicken Sukha on tacos - Rs.350/-Classic take on a Chicken sukha with neer dosaYetti Meatball Ghee roast - Rs.500/-  Juicy prawn meatballs drenched in bold ghee roast masala – a bite of coastal blissKori roti Hokkaido Pav - Rs.450/-Traditional Kori roti all inside a pav with a Mangaluru kari on the side. Pork Ribs “BAFFAT” and Pav - Rs.550/-Succulent pork ribs smothered in bold Baffat spice, served with a side of Bombay pav. Balekai Baileys - Rs.400/-Baileys-infused banana bread blissTerms and Conditions : The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an eventConservatory is located on the 2nd floor of courtyard which is a 44 steps climb upDo not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.Children aged 7 and above require a ticket to attend the meal. If you are bringing a child under 7, please inform us in advance, as we do not have a baby seat at the venue.The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.Management will entertain no liability or claims arising due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval.Please note that both vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes are prepared in the same kitchen.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.
